value.name: ‘I’m not capable of being your friend:’ Jacksonville man arrested, accused of cyberstalking woman after Tinder date
value.description: Be careful of who you meet up with online. What started as a Tinder date for one woman led to stalking, police said. The woman and Michael “Mike” Kline, 38, met on the dating app in late March.
